definition[0]: tied, fastened etc tightly, especially in order to make something safe
example[0]: All firearms should be kept securely locked in a cabinet.
definition[1]: in a way that protects something from being stolen or lost
example[1]: Customers can now buy products securely over the Internet.
definition[2]: in a way that is likely to continue successfully and not change
example[2]: By that time, democracy had become securely established in Spain.
